featured.title: E-Commerce Platform with Admin Dashboard
featured.description: Full-featured e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management, payment integration, and comprehensive admin dashboard.
featured.longDescription: A complete e-commerce ecosystem built with Next.js and Firebase. Features include user authentication, product catalog management, shopping cart, payment processing with Stripe, order tracking, and a powerful admin dashboard with analytics and inventory management.

featured.title: Smart Home IoT Control System
featured.description: Arduino-based IoT system for home automation with mobile app control and real-time monitoring.
featured.longDescription: An integrated IoT ecosystem that allows users to control home appliances, monitor environmental conditions, and automate daily routines. Built with Arduino, sensors, and a Flutter mobile application with Firebase backend for real-time data synchronization.

regular.title: Company Profile Website
regular.description: Modern, responsive company profile with CMS integration and SEO optimization.
regular.longDescription: Professional company website built with Next.js featuring dynamic content management, SEO optimization, contact forms, and performance optimization. Includes admin panel for content updates.

regular.title: Mobile Expense Tracker
regular.description: Flutter-based expense tracking app with data visualization and budget management.
regular.longDescription: Personal finance management mobile application with expense categorization, budget tracking, spending analytics, and export functionality. Built with Flutter and local/cloud data synchronization.

regular.title: Sales Data Analysis Dashboard
regular.description: Python-based data analysis tool with interactive visualizations and insights.
regular.longDescription: Comprehensive sales analytics dashboard built with Python, featuring data processing, statistical analysis, trend prediction, and interactive visualizations using matplotlib and seaborn.

regular.title: Automated Greenhouse System
regular.description: IoT-powered greenhouse monitoring and control system with environmental automation.
regular.longDescription: Intelligent greenhouse management system using sensors for temperature, humidity, soil moisture monitoring with automated irrigation, ventilation, and lighting control based on environmental conditions.
